Reference

All functions

RAIDS-package RAIDS

RAIDS: Accurate Inference of Genetic Ancestry from Cancer Sequences

add1KG2SampleGDS()

Add the genotype information for the list of pruned SNVs into the Profile GDS file

addBlockFromPlink2GDS()

TODO contain the information from 1KG

addGeneBlockGDSRefAnnot()

Generate two indexes based on gene annotation for gdsAnnot1KG block and add the indexes into the gdsAnnot1KG

addPhase1KG2SampleGDSFromFile()

TODO

addPhase1KG2SampleGDSFromGDS()

TODO

addRef2GDS1KG()

Add the information about the unrelated patients to the 1KG GDS file

addStudy1Kg()

Append information about the 1KG samples into the Profile GDS file

appendStudy2GDS1KG()

Create the GDS Sample file(s) for one or multiple specific samples using the information from a RDS Sample description file and the 1KG GDS file

basePCASample()

Compute principal component axes (PCA) on SNV data using the reference samples

computeAncestryFromSyntheticFile()

Select the optimal K and D parameters using the synthetic data and infer the ancestry of a specific sample

computeKNNRefSample()

Run a k-nearest neighbors analysis on a 1KG reference profile

computeKNNRefSynthetic()

Run a k-nearest neighbors analysis on a subset of the synthetic dataset

computePCAMultiSynthetic()

Project synthetic profiles onto existing principal component axes generated using the reference 1KG profiles

computePCARefSample()

Compute Principal Component Analysis (PCA) on SNV genotype for data from a sample

computePoolSyntheticAncestry()

TODO

computePoolSyntheticAncestryGr()

Run a PCA analysis and a K-nearest neighbors analysis on a small set of synthetic data using all 1KG profiles except the ones used to generate the synthetic profiles

computePrunedPCARef()

Compute principal component axes (PCA) on pruned SNV with the reference samples

computeSyntheticROC()

TODO

createStudy2GDS1KG()

Create the Profile GDS file(s) for one or multiple specific profiles using the information from a RDS Sample description file and the 1KG GDS file

estimateAllelicFraction()

Estimate the allelic fraction of the pruned SNVs for a specific profile

gds2tfam()

create a file tfam file for plink from the gdsReference file

gds2tfamSample()

create a file tfam file for plink from the gdsProfile file

gds2tped()

create a file tped file for plink from the gds file

generateGDS1KG()

Generate the GDS file that will contain the information from 1KG data set (reference data set)

generateMapSnvSel()

Generate the filter SNP information file in RDS format

generatePhase1KG2GDS()

Adding the phase information into the Reference GDS file

getRef1KGPop()

Extract the specified column from the 1KG GDS 'sample.ref' node for the reference profiles (real ancestry assignation)

groupChr1KGSNV()

Merge the genotyping files per chromosome into one file

identifyRelative()

Identify genetically unrelated patients in GDS 1KG file

prepPed1KG()

Prepare the pedigree file using pedigree information from 1KG

prepSynthetic()

Add information related to the synthetic profiles (study and synthetic reference profiles information) into a Profile GDS file

projectSample2PCA()

Project profile onto existing principal component axes (PCA)

pruningSample()

Compute the list of pruned SNVs for a specific profile using the information from the 1KG GDS file and a linkage disequilibrium analysis

runExomeAncestry()

TODO

select1KGPop()

Random selection of a specific number of reference profiles in each subcontinental population present in the 1KG GDS file

snvListVCF()

Generate a VCF with the information from the SNPs that pass a cut-off threshold

splitSelectByPop()

Group samples per subcontinental population

syntheticGeno()

Generate synthetic profiles for each cancer profile and 1KG reference profile combination and add them to the Profile GDS file
